name: Hat Trick 2020
overview: Hat Trick 2020 (also known as Hat Trick: Four Player Mod and Hat Trick Extended) is a hacked version of Pacific Dataworks International's official C64 conversion of the arcade game of the same name. This hack adds the ability for up to four players to play, in teams of two, as opposed to two players only. This extended version hack was done by Barfly and released into the public domain on February 21, 2020.
